column1: Node Description: SGI Altix ICE 8200EX Compute Node

column2: 32 KB I + 32 KB D on chip per core

column1: Determines the maximum number of nonblocking sends and
receives that can simultaneously exist for any single MPI
process.  MPI generates an error message if this limit
(or the default, if not set) is exceeded.  Default:  16384
Determines the maximum number of data types that can
simultaneously exist for any single MPI process.
MPI generates an error message if this limit (or the default,
if not set) is exceeded.  Default:  8192
Determines the number of shared message buffers (16 KB each)
that MPI is to allocate for each host. These buffers are used
to send and receive long inter-host messages.
Controls the number of other ranks that a rank can receive from
over InfiniBand using a short message fast path. This is 8 by
default and can be any value between 0 and 32.
Removes limits on the maximum size of the automatically-
